headline: Phillips 66 (NYSE:PSX) Engages in Activist Showdown with Podcast Diplomacy
summary: Phillips 66 (NYSE:PSX) has been actively engaging in proxy battles and strategic communications amid activist pressures, primarily from Elliott Management. Over the last quarter, its share price declined by 20.11%, which aligned broadly with the volatile downward trends in the market, where major indices, including the S&P 500, faced declines spurred by trade tensions and tariff uncertainties. Despite Phillips 66’s business expansions, such as the acquisition enhancing its pipeline...

headline: Elliott launches ‘Streamline 66’ podcast with Philips 66 director nominees
summary: Elliott Investment Management, which manages funds that together make it a top five shareholder in Phillips 66 (PSX), announced the launch of the Streamline 66 Podcast, a new series that will feature 1:1 conversations with Elliott’s director nominees as well as industry experts. Episodes can be accessed on Streamline66.com, and are available on Apple, Spotify and everywhere podcasts are heard. headline: Energy Industry Veteran Gregory J. Goff Releases Letter to Fellow Phillips 66 Shareholders
